pages.text: The Buyer automatically buys items. It will automatically buy items every second (count depends on tier), and can be extracted from with pipes.$(br)To set an item, have one in your inventory, then open the GUI and click on it. That will set the buyer's target to said item, $(o)if$() it can be bought and isn't locked behind a $(item)permit$().
Go to the next page to view the GUI descriptions.

1: Buyer target. Shows what this buyer's target is, none if no target.$(br)2: Output slot. Bought items will be sent here.$(br)3: Current bank account. The bank account from which the items are being bought.$(br)4: Change account. Change the account from which to buy.
